A.name: Account
A.desc: The charges are to be charged to an account.

AA.name: Cash on delivery service charge paid by consignor
AA.desc:
An indication that the consignor is responsible for the payment of the
                                    cash on delivery service charge.

AB.name: Cash on delivery service charge paid by consignee
AB.desc:
An indication that the consignee is responsible for the payment of the
                                    cash on delivery service charge.

AC.name: Insurance costs paid by consignor
AC.desc:
An indication that the consignor is responsible for the payment of the
                                    insurance costs.

AD.name: Insurance costs paid by consignee
AD.desc:
An indication that the consignee is responsible for the payment of the
                                    insurance costs.

CA.name: Advance collect
CA.desc:
The amount of freight or other charge on a shipment advanced by one
                                    transportation line to another or to the shipper, to be collected from consignee.

CC.name: Collect
CC.desc: A shipment on which freight charges will be paid by consignee.

CF.name: Collect, freight credited to payment customer
CF.desc:
The freight is collect but has been paid by the shipper and will be
                                    credited to that party.

DF.name: Defined by buyer and seller
DF.desc:
The payment method for transport charges have been defined by the
                                    buyer and seller.

FO.name: FOB port of call
FO.desc:
Title and control of goods pass to the buyer at port of call.
                                    Responsibility for export taxes and cost of documents for overseas shipments have
                                    not been specified.

IC.name: Information copy, no payment due
IC.desc: Transaction set has been provided for information only.

MX.name: Mixed
MX.desc: The consignment is partially collect and partially prepaid.

NC.name: Service freight, no charge
NC.desc:
The consignment is shipped on a service basis and there is no freight
                                    charge.

NS.name: Not specified
NS.desc: The payment method for transport charges have not been specified.

PA.name: Advance prepaid
PA.desc: Costs have been paid in advance.

PB.name: Customer pick-up/backhaul
PB.desc:
Buyer's private carriage picks up the goods as a return load to the
                                    buyer's facility.

PC.name: Prepaid but charged to customer
PC.desc:
shipping charges have been paid in advance of shipment but are charged
                                    back to consignee usually as line item on invoice for the purchased goods.

PE.name: Payable elsewhere
PE.desc: Place of payment not known at the begin of conveyance.

PO.name: Prepaid only
PO.desc:
Payment in advance of freight and/or other charges prior to delivery
                                    of shipment at destination, usually by shipper at point of origin.

PP.name: Prepaid (by seller)
PP.desc:
Seller of goods makes payment to carrier for freight charges prior to
                                    shipment.

PU.name: Pickup
PU.desc:
Customer is responsible for payment of pickup charges at shipping
                                    point.

RC.name: Return container freight paid by customer
RC.desc: The freight for returning the container is paid by the customer.

RF.name: Return container freight free
RF.desc: There is no freight charge for returning the container.

RS.name: Return container freight paid by supplier
RS.desc:
The freight charge for returning the container is paid by the
                                    supplier.

TP.name: Third party pay
TP.desc:
A third party, someone other than buyer or seller, is identified as
                                    responsible for payment of shipping charges.

WC.name: Weight condition
WC.desc: The payment method for transport charges are due to the weight.

WD.name: Paid by supplier
WD.desc: Transport charges will be paid by the supplier.

WE.name: Paid by buyer
WE.desc: Transport charges will be paid by the buyer.

ZZZ.name: Mutually defined
ZZZ.desc:
A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and
                                    as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code
                                    list.
